name: Akyishigal
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. flying, 40 ft. burrowing
description: Akyishigal is a massive fiend that utilizes a cloud of stinging insects emitted from its body, making it both a terrifying and disruptive presence on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to summon offspring and emit hazardous swarms of insects makes Akyishigal a uniquely challenging foe.
goals: Akyishigal seeks to disrupt and destroy its foes using its abilities and minions.
relations: Often found in the company of lesser fiends or insect swarms.
environment: Typically dwells in dark, chaotic realms, potentially near sources of corruption.
strengths: High mobility with flight and burrowing capabilities, excellent defenses against magic, and the ability to summon spawn.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to interruption while concentrating on its spells and abilities.
attacks: Akyishigal delivers slashing damage through its multiple claws, enhanced by poisonous strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Cloak of Swarms, releasing a cloud of stinging insects to impede and damage enemies.
senses: Possesses truesight to see through illusions and perceive creatures hidden from normal sight.
skills: Excels in Acrobatics and Stealth, showcasing significant agility and sneaky capabilities.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, lightning, and poison damage, along with the poisoned condition.
Advantages on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Legendary Resistance allows it to automatically succeed on failed saving throws three times a day.
Capable of changing shape into insectoid forms or teleporting short distances rapidly.
Can cast spells including insect-themed magic that can control foes or summon giant insects.
spellcasting: Akyishigal can cast spells using Charisma, including detection, stealth enhancement, and plague-causing magic.
